content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
- Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups connecting the offshore pump to the boiler and steam engine, facilitating fluid movement. The pipe groups are located at various positions, including:
- PipeGroup at position(-12.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup at position(-9.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup at position(-10.5, 22.5)
- PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 23.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing small electric poles
- Ensure that the area where you are attempting to place the small electric pole is clear of other entities to avoid placement failures.

### Errors when reconnecting steam engine to power network
- Verify that all connections to the power network are properly established and that there are no obstructions preventing the steam engine from receiving power.

### Errors related to fluid connections
- Check that the offshore pump is properly connected to the water source and that the boiler has access to the necessary input liquid to function correctly.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
